raw_text: Fernando – Lion Capt. Jermyn L.C. (Founder,​ Chairman and Managing Director of Suntan Beach Resorts (Pvt) Ltd.) Beloved husband of Hazel,​ loving father of Dilanjan Lakraj Jayasooriya,​ father-in-law of Dr. Chamindi Jayasooriya,​ grandfather of Kiara and Andrew,​ Son of late Clarence. Fernando and Miriam Fernando,​ brother of Locksley and Desmond,​ brother-in-law of late Septi and late Anurika,​ was called to rest in the arms of Jesus on 15th July 2023. Remains lie at his residence at No. 20/​2,​ Borella Cross Road,​ Colombo 8. Funeral service will take place at 2:30 p.m. on Monday,​ 17th July at the residence followed by burial at Borella General Cemetery at 3:30 p.m. (Roman Catholic Section)044021

JAYAMANNA – PREMA (Ex-employee of Ceylon Theatres Ltd and No. 2 employee of State Film Corporation) – Beloved wife of Max,​ loving mother of Ruwan and Suneth,​ grandmother of Zosia,​ mother-in-law of Anna,​ daughter of Sinhala film pioneers,​ late BAW Jayamanne and Grace,​ sister of late Sweenitha,​ Mallika and late Gamini,​ sister-in-law of Ananda Munasinghe,​ late Dr. K.C. Fernando and Kanthi Jayamanne. Her remains lie at the Jayaratne Funeral Parlour (‘Restpect’) Borella,​ from 8.30 a.m. to 8.00 p.m. on Sunday 16th July and from 8.00 a.m. to 2.30 p.m. on Monday 17th July. The cortege will leave the parlour at 3.30 p.m. after a religious service at 2.30 p.m. for cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4 p.m. (Old Crematorium).044018

PHILIPS – GUNAM (Formerly of Sugar Corporation,​ Kantalai) – Beloved husband of Premi Philips (formerly of Bank of Ceylon),​ loving father of Navin,​ Nishan and Nadhini,​ father-in-law of Kavita,​ Nilu and Gunaranjan. Remains lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour,​ Kalubowila on 19th July 2023 from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Cortege leaves parlour at 4.30 p.m. for cremation at Kohuwala Cemetery.043983
